required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Cefepime/AAI101 Phase 2 Study in Hospitalized Adults With cUTI
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized, Double-Blind, Multi-Center Study of Cefepime/AAI101 in Hospitalized Adults With Complicated Urinary Tract Infections, Including Acute Pyelonephritis

brief_summary.textblock:
Phase 2, randomised, double-blind, 2-cohort study in hospitalised adults with complicated urinary tract infection (cUTI), including acute pyelonephritis. All study cohorts were randomised in a 2:1 ratio. Treatment duration for each cohort was 7 to 10 days. Patients were not permitted to switch to oral therapy.
Cohort 1: 15 patients treated with cefepime 1 g/AAI101 500 mg intravenous (i.v.) infusion over 2 hours once every 8 hours (q8h), and 7 patients treated with cefepime 1 g i.v. infusion over 2 hours q8h.
Cohort 2: 15 patients treated with cefepime 2 g/AAI101 750 mg i.v. infusion over 2 hours q8h, and 8 patients treated with cefepime 2 g i.v. infusion over 2 hours q8h.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Microbiological Response at the Test of Cure (TOC) Visit in the Microbiological Modified Intent-to-Treat (mMITT) Population
primary_outcome.description: Microbiological response is eradication for each baseline pathogen

secondary_outcome.measure: Microbiological Response at the TOC Visit in the Microbiologically Evaluable (ME) Population.
secondary_outcome.description: Microbiological response is eradication for each baseline pathogen

arm_group.description: cefepime 1 g or cefepime 2 g in combination with AAI101 500 mg or 750 mg

facility.name: Centralny Szpital Kliniczny Ministerstwa Spraw Wewnetrznych i Administracji w Warszawie, Klinika Chorob Wewnetrznych, Nefrologii i Transplantologii
Fakultna nemocnica s poliklinikou J.A. Reimana Presov
Chernihiv City Hospital #2 of Chernihiv City Council, department of Urology
